name: Oxygène
overview: Oxygene was a disk-magazine magazine game and is a close copy of the C64 classic Uridium, released in 1986 for several other 8-bit platforms. You control a side scrolling spaceship that can reverse direction left or right, and move top to bottom based on stick input. Various enemies appear both in flight and on the giant dreadnought ships below which you can destroy.
